Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Roland! Give up already... Do you think you can get away after such a long fight with me? Don't be a fool!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'I do remember you talking this much the last time I had your face under my boot.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hey, you're not looking very well! You got a stomach ache? Need a lie-down from the heat?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "You are stronger, I'll give you that. Not smarter, though.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I've been luring you to Ascendant territory, and your monkey brain followed.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Grotesque, corroded Corrupted crawl out of the sand.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Uh... Oh! I know something's wrong with you! You wouldn't have asked for help otherwise, would you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "(Takes a look at the gold dust flowing past him in the air) You're... you're so dead.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You've been solid as a rock for so long... but now you're here, you're falling apart.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: '(Looks up) Huh? What are you looking at? Is it... the gold dust? Oh, I think I get it...', 4: '1'}
